original_text: And when her masters saw that the hope of their gains was gone, they caught Paul and Silas, and drew them into the marketplace unto the rulers,
korean_text: 여종의 주인들은 자기 수익의 소망이 끊어진 것을 보고 바울과 실라를 붙잡아 장터로 관리들에게 끌어 갔다가

sentences.original_text: that the hope of their gains was gone
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 이익에 대한 희망이 사라졌다는 것을

sentences.original_text: and drew them into the marketplace
